text: Aerviva is international Dubai-based aviation recruitment consultancy that provides recruitment, onboarding, and contract management services for aviation personnel in the European and Middle Eastern markets, as well as staff leasing and aviation consultancy solutions. == Overview == Aerviva DWC was established on November 15, 2015, in Dubai Aviation City Corporation (DACC) Free Zone under Dubai South HQ to offer human resource consultancy services to private airlines, MRO and aviation companies. Jainita Hogervorst is the general manager of the company. In 2022, Aerviva established Aerviva Aviation Consultancy with an office in the mainland of Dubai, UAE. == References == Category:Aviation
title: Aerviva
